Interface TallySocialComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SocialComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LikingSocialComponent, RatingSocialComponent, VotingSocialComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface TallySocialComponent
extends SocialComponent
    Social Component for any Tally resource.

      • getCurrentUserResponse

        ResponseValue getCurrentUserResponse()
                              throws TallyException
        Returns:
        the current users response given a session.
        Throws:

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getResponseTallies()
        Returns:

      • getCanUserRespond

        boolean getCanUserRespond()
        Returns:
